item.description: Our first meetup was a success and we discussed the capabilities of Wolfram|Alpha, the growth of our website and the newest topics to be added. We ended our meeting with a Q&A session that was enlightening to all involved. We hope to gather Wolfram|Alpha enthusiasts from the Boston area to discuss the current and future versions of Wolfram|Alpha. This time around, we will continue to talk about our website and answer any questions you may have! Please come join us on October 5th at 7pm for food, drinks and great discussions.
item.name: Wolfram|Alpha October Meetup
